text: Dar on ço, ki Zakarijo alajhissalom in holatro did va mehruʙonii Allohro nisʙat ʙa Marjam muşohida kard, az Alloh xost, to ūro farzande ʙidihad. In dar hole ʙud, ki ū az doştani farzand noumed şuda ʙud. Pas guft: "Parvardigoro! Az çoniʙi xud farzandi nekū ʙaroi man ato farmo! Hamono Tu şunavandai du'o hastī
